Package com.lukflug.panelstudio.settings

Class ToggleableContainer

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
com.lukflug.panelstudio.settings.ToggleableContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Toggleable
public class ToggleableContainer
extends CollapsibleContainer
A CollapsibleContainer that can be toggled by the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • ToggleableContainer

      public ToggleableContainer​(java.lang.String title, Renderer renderer, Toggleable open, Animation animation, Toggleable toggle)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      title - caption of the container
      renderer - the Renderer for the container
      open - the Toggleable indicating whether the container is open or closed
      animation - the animation for opening and closing the container
      toggle - the Toggleable to be toggled by the user

  • Method Details

    • handleButton

      public void handleButton​(Context context, int button)
      Switches the toggle when clicked.
      Specified by:
      handleButton in interface Component
      Overrides:
      handleButton in class CollapsibleContainer
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      button - the button that changed its state
      See Also:
      Interface.LBUTTON, Interface.RBUTTON

    • isActive

      protected boolean isActive()
      The title bar for the container is active, depending on the state of the toggle.
      Overrides:
      isActive in class CollapsibleContainer
      Returns:
      set to true, if title bar is active
